sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-toolbar id="toolbar" color="#fff">
        <v-btn class="tool-btn" to="" stacked>
            <v-icon icon="mdi-pencil"></v-icon>
            포트폴리오
        </v-btn>
        <v-btn class="tool-btn" to="" stacked>
            <v-icon icon="mdi-text-box"></v-icon>
            자기소개서
        </v-btn>
        <v-btn class="tool-btn" @click="dialog = true" stacked>
            <v-badge color="error" dot>
                <v-icon icon="mdi-email"></v-icon>
            </v-badge>
            연락처보기
        </v-btn>
    </v-toolbar>
    <v-dialog v-model="dialog" width="auto">
        <v-card>
            <v-card-text>
                <v-text-field v-model="lastname" :rules="nameRules" :counter="10" label="Last name" required></v-text-field>
                <v-text-field v-model="lastname" :rules="nameRules" :counter="10" label="Last name" required></v-text-field>
            </v-card-text>
            <v-card-actions>
                <v-btn color="primary" block @click="dialog = false">Close Dialog</v-btn>
            </v-card-actions>
        </v-card>
    </v-dialog>
</template>
<script>

export default {
    data() {
        return {
            dialog: false,
        }
    },
}
</script>
